package.name: evolution
package.summary: evolution: recommended update for all users
package.description: Critical and annoying issues like Pinging IMAP server even when offline, attachment drag & drop crash, Hang in connector, appointment loses, crashes due to specific appointments, attachment getting corrupted, handling of GPG/PGP signed mails, Junk/Unjunk handling of GW, MS-live meeting handling, hang in exchange-connector and exchange connection issues are fixed.
